background_description: The background consists primarily of dark blue open water, with numerous small, bright particles scattered throughout. On the far left, there is a dark, indistinct vertical structure, possibly part of a tank wall or dark rock. In the bottom right corner, there are rocky formations that appear to have some algae or subtle coral growth.
explanation: The Longhorn Cowfish is prominently displayed against a dark blue open water background. Its light yellowish-white body with distinct blue spots and unique body shape make it clearly visible and it does not blend with any elements of its surroundings, confirming the absence of camouflage.
